documentation.short: Implementation of the receive path for the ChipCon CC2420 radio.

This layer keeps a history of the past RECEIVE_HISTORY_SIZE received messages If the source address and dsn number of a newly received message matches our recent history, we drop the message because we've already seen it.
HPL implementation of general-purpose I/O for the ChipCon CC2420 radio connected to a TI MSP430 processor.
HPL implementation of interrupts and captures for the ChipCon CC2420 radio connected to a TI MSP430 processor.
Implementation for configuring a ChipCon CC2420 radio.
Implementation of basic SPI primitives for the ChipCon CC2420 radio.
MainC is the system interface the TinyOS boot sequence.
